thread.title: Monique

author: Monique
title: Monique
text: they should at least offer free shipping if your purchase is over $100 automatically. Most websites allow you to use more than one discount code at a time. I haven't received my items yet, but the ordering process was sort of painless. If you are paying with paypal, you cannot select that option on the first page, you have to hit checkout first and add all of your adresses first. Otherwise everything went smoothly.
